name: test_e2e_with_logs[SQLI_BOOL_004]
description:

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_BOOL_004` |
| **Name** | Alternative boolean condition |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | boolean_based_blind |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Encoded**: `%27%20OR%20%27a%27%3D%27a`
